comments:
Some more widget disposed errors for the refresh on the CVSHistoryPage. Make use of the CVS Utils async exec, will ya!

eclipse.buildId=I20060118-0800

Fixed for a long time - we now use Utils.asyncExec for all of the table viewer input setting.
